articles.title: For all he’s done, Mike Tirico will experience ‘thrill of a lifetime’ calling first Super Bowl for NBC
articles.description:
The magnitude of the opportunity doesn’t escape Tirico, even with all of the success and fulfilled broadcasting dreams he has already enjoyed in his career.

The post For all he’s done, Mike Tirico will experience ‘thrill of a lifetime’ calling first Super Bowl for NBC appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Tirico will call his first Super Bowl for NBC on February 12, 2026.
Tirico's experience includes significant broadcasting achievements, enhancing local sports coverage.
Boston residents can expect a high-quality broadcast of the Patriots' game.

articles.title: 60 fun facts, stats, and things to know about Super Bowl LX before Patriots take on Seahawks
articles.description:
The Patriots are 4.5-point underdogs for Super Bowl LX, but that's just one of the many things you need to know ahead of Sunday's game.

The post 60 fun facts, stats, and things to know about Super Bowl LX before Patriots take on Seahawks appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots enter Super Bowl LX as 4.5-point underdogs against the Seahawks.
Game scheduled for Sunday, February 12, 2026, attracting local fan excitement.
Local businesses expect increased sales during the Super Bowl weekend.

articles.title: Patriots’ Mike Vrabel reportedly received pointers from Bill Belichick and a rival coach ahead of Super Bowl LX
articles.description:
Vrabel is also reportedly leaning on offensive coordinator Josh McDaniels's experience.

The post Patriots’ Mike Vrabel reportedly received pointers from Bill Belichick and a rival coach ahead of Super Bowl LX appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Vrabel seeks advice from Bill Belichick before Super Bowl LX.
Vrabel also consults offensive coordinator Josh McDaniels for strategic insights.
This collaboration aims to enhance the Patriots' performance in the championship.
